name: The Pursuit of Happiness in Unusual Times
name_original: The Pursuit of Happiness in Unusual Times
description:
There's a simple magic to live happily ever after -  unsee whatever you wouldn't want to see.

Be selective, be nice to yourself, see only the nice things regardless if they are the truth or not.

-----------------------------------

Game play: 

Keep walking with "D" or the right arrow on your keyboard
Get rid of unpleasant things by pressing the Space Bar

-----------------------------------

Audio clip: 

Loveable from BenSound
Crowd cheering audio clip from Sound Bible

-----------------------------------

Please share your feedback under "Comments", thank you!
